resources.string: Amadeus
en
en-US
Application settings
Recognition language
Select voice recognition language
Language
Select app language (app restart required)
Show subtitles
Shows subtitles for Amadeus\' answers
Hello.
Don\'t call me like that!
But I refuse.
I never thought you were such a devilish pervert. I guess I misjudged you.
I guess.
Nice.
PERVERT CONFIRMED.
Sorry.
Sounds tough.
This guy is hopeless, better do something quick.
Gah.
Stop adding -tina!
You pervert! Are you an idiot!? Do you wanna die?!
I\'m Makise Kurisu, pleased to meet you.
Who the hell is Christina?
I am worried about it. Why am I Christina?
Christina?
Ask me whatever you want. I\'ll answer anything I can.
Um, could I help you with that?
What do you want?
What is it?
Hehehe.
Huh? Why do you say that?
You sure?
Nice to meet you, Okabe Rintaro. I\'m Makise Kurisu.
I look forward to working with you.
Anyway, can I ask a question?
Um… Senpai? Excuse me.
Hey Senpai, about what we were just talking about…
Uh, who is this?
Senpai, please, don\'t tell the others…
I\'m still not happy about that.
That\s pure nonsense.
Let\'s see… My conclusion is that it\'s not possible.
That\'s probably because scientists haven\'t discovered something important yet.
But we don\'t know for sure that it\'s impossible, I guess.
A time machine, you said?
Even humans speak of themselves as a combination of hardware and software, right?
But memory data isn\'t like normal data. It\'s much more complex.
I keep a secret diary.
Modifying my memories? It\'s theoretically possible.
For example, it would be possible to make me think my name was Christina.
Gah. Ah… Aaaaah.
Awesome, he\'s really something!
Nice!
Oh no!
Where are the Japanese shaman girls, Lintahlo?
Holy Cow! So I said we should come soon
Or should I have introduced myself with, \"It\'s Christina\"?
Nice to meet you. I\'m Makise Kurisu
I\'m Makise Kurisu
OK
Huh
Hhuh?
What are you talking about?
Why? Have we met before?
By the way, time travel to the future is available to us right now, according to Einstein\'s special theory of relativity
Are you from the future?
A cosmic string is a string shaped \"crevice\" with extreme mass
The string is a \"crevice\" about as wide as an elementary particle, and at least as long as the diameter of a galaxy
The string has immense mass, so it distorts space-time. If you were to travel through this distortion, you could make a full circle around the string in less than 360 degrees
According to the special theory of relativity, time will flow slower for the cosmic string in relation to its surroundings
If you use two cosmic strings, you can do a space deficit jump. If you loop back to your original location, you can return to the same time you started revolving
By the way, cosmic strings are not the same as superstrings
There are two wormholes joined by a tunnel. No matter how far away the wormholes are, transit time through the tunnel is zero
The wormhole tunnel suffers from super gravity, and collapses as soon as it opens
If you stabilize the wormhole tunnel with exotic matter injection, instantaneous travel between wormholes becomes possible. To travel through time, however, takes a little more effort
The prerequisites for wormhole travel are simpler than the ones for cosmic string travel
This still can\'t be called true time travel. It only seems that way. This is called the Urashima effect
Time travel theories are all just thought experiments. Not one of them can create a viable time machine. That is my answer
Even if someone did overcome the logistical requirements, there may be other factors that prevent time travel from working
You can\'t think of it like a sci-fi movie. It\'s not just about your family tree. There are far greater dangers than that
Any paradox, no matter how small, would cause the collapse of the causality, the crumble of the theory of relativity, and even the breakdown of all the laws of physics
Paradoxes are nothing more than thought experiments. They cannot occur in reality, and they should not
Nothing that has even a 0.000001% chance of causing a paradox can happen. The universe won\'t allow it. Wouldn\'t you say this is the logical conclusion?
Who are you calling a zombie?
You... idiot!
That creepy grin... are you thinking perverted thoughts again?
I don\'t mind lending you my knowledge, but if there is more pervy nonsense involved, the answer is NO
Stop adding -tina! My name is Kurisu!
I won\'t answer to either. Use my real name
Come on! No more saying \'perv\'! I won\'t treat you like a perv either! So let\'s drop it already!
